name: Stephen Hebert
summary: Experienced full stack web development professional seeking fully remote opportunities in development, management, and technical training.

roles.title: Lead Developer / Manager
roles.description: Managing development for enterprise Agile modernization project.  Supporting statewide developer recruiting efforts.
highlights: Architected PBAC system to meet business needs and InfoSec requirements.
Led development of public-facing reactive web application for state agency office listing.

roles.title: Senior Developer
highlights: Developed Javascript libraries for custom typeahead and grid UI components.
roles.environment: Javascript, Vue, C#, Github, Agile, HTML, CSS, JIRA, AWS S3, ADFS, Identity Server, IIS, SQL Server 2016, Octopus, Cypress, Veracode, Figma

roles.title: Technical Analyst
roles.description: User, network, server & cloud service administration.  Remote & on-site technical support.

workHistory.location: Seattle, WA and Baton Rouge, LA

roles.title: Developer, Consultant, Technical Trainer
roles.description: Consulted for various web design & development projects.  Provided individual instruction on topics related to web development.

workHistory.location: Ipswich, England, UK and Seattle, WA

roles.title: Developer & Support Analyst
roles.description: Coded, tested, provisioned, supported, administrated proprietary network product and service.
highlights: Developed web-based network configuration interface for modified routing appliance.
Implemented tools to foster developer communication and collaboration.
roles.environment: Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, HTML, Javascript, Subversion, Bugzilla

roles.title: QA & Support Analyst
roles.description: Manually tested user interfaces and function of proprietary rackmount appliance, and documented any existing issues. Provisioned and shipped Espion products.  Provided technical support via phone and email.

roles.title: Developer & Support Analyst
roles.description: Developed & maintained static website.  Provided hardware, software, peripheral, database & network support.

roles.title: Technical Instructor / DBA
roles.description: Provided group & individual instruction on topics related to web development & office software. Maintained Lotus Notes databases & applications.
roles.environment: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Photoshop, Lotus Notes

roles.title: Developer / Co-founder
roles.description: Designed, developed & deployed static websites for small private & public clients.

roles.title: Support Technician
roles.description: Provided technical support via phone and in person.  Initialized, installed, configured, issued & supported Windows workstations.  Troubleshooted and repaired computer systems and peripherals.
